model.name: OFFICES_DS
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE OFFICES ( ID string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ID`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COUNTRY string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`COUNTRY`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CITY string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CITY`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ADDRESS string(150) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ADDRESS`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ID) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`PRIMARY`') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`RHTE`.`OFFICES`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: OFFICES_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW OFFICES ( ID string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COUNTRY string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CITY string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ADDRESS string(150) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ID) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT * FROM OFFICES_DS.OFFICES;

model.name: OFFICES
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW OFFICES ( ID string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), COUNTRY string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CITY string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ADDRESS string(150) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ID) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT * FROM OFFICES_VBL.OFFICES;
